rows.label: tlk41200141_02_msg0001
rows.name:
They say there are a lot of kids here who lost
their homes in the war, just like me...

rows.label: tlk41200141_02_msg0002
rows.name:
It's not just Iraada Village... lots of sad things
are happening all over Alst...

rows.label: tlk41200141_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Dad told me that the Hr√¶svelgr Merc Group
exists to stop those sad things from happening.
